00008 struct XVOmniWarper {
00009   static int defCenterX ;
00010   static int defCenterY ;
00011   static int defHorizon ;
00012 
00013   int centerX ;     // x co-ordinate of mirror center on image
00014   int centerY ;     // y co-ordinate of mirror center on image
00015   int horizon ;     // distance on image from center to horizon
00016 
00017   XVOmniWarper() : centerX(defCenterX), centerY(defCenterY), 
00018     horizon(defHorizon) {}
00019 
00020 /*
00021   This omni2plane function unwarps an image obtained by omni-camera to a plane 
00022   image by geometric transformation. Some of the code is due to Sang-Chul Lee.
00023 */
00024 
00025 /* Parameters --
00026    source:            input image ;
00027    nwidth, nheight:   dimensions of desired output image width ;
00028    xd, yd:            coordinates of a point on the input image as direction ;
00029    k:                 re-sampling factor ;
00030    Returns --         output image ;
00031 */
00032 
00033   template<class XVImage>
00034   XVImage omni2plane( const XVImage& source, int nwidth, int nheight, 
00035                 int xd, int yd, double k = 1.0 ) const ;
00036 
00037 /* Parameters --
00038    source:            input image ;
00039    nwidth, nheight:   dimensions of desired output image width ;
00040    theta, phai:       direction ;
00041    k:                 re-sampling factor ;
00042    Returns --         output image ;
00043 */
00044 
00045   template<class XVImage>
00046   XVImage omni2plane( const XVImage& source, int nwidth, int nheight, 
00047                 double theta, double phai, double k = 1.0 ) const ;
00048 
00049 };
00050 
00051 # endif //_XVOMNIWARPER_H_
